usercssData.name: Baidu Lite 百度轻 - 轻萌化
usercssData.author: 神代夕綺
usercssData.description: 你一定会喜欢的简约且好看的百度轻萌化！作者博客：kira.cool项目地址：GitHub功能特性： 1. 持续维护的百度样式 2. 提供搜索页、新闻页、视频页等多个页面的样式支持 3. 卡片半透明化 4. 高分屏适配 5. 支持自定义图片背景TODO： 1. 支持自定义单双栏 2. 支持自定义卡片分辨率注意：1. 百度会为未登录百度账号的设备提供不同的 css 样式文件，在 v1.0.6a 版本中简单修复了这个 css 文件额外带来的部分问题。但仍有一些问题未处理，您可能需要登录百度账号以避免出现不必要的问题。2. 在使用百度主题后也有可能会出现不必要的问题，您可能需要在使用本样式前先关闭百度自带的样式功能才能保证本样式的正常工作。反馈：在 stylish 反馈可能较晚才能收到回复，您如果在使用过程中遇到什么问题可以在 这篇文章 留言，亦可在 GitHub 上提Issus，不一定能解决就是了。鸣谢：pan_cao - Baidu Lite 百度轻silence lu - bilibili33 娘背景图：P站id 62101308

bg.label: 自定义背景（请使用网络图片，上传图片可能会遇到BUG）
bg.name: bg

bg-custom.label: 自定义背景（请使用网络图片，上传图片可能会遇到BUG） (Custom)
bg-custom.name: bg-custom

sections.code:
/*
** Copyright    Human
** Author       ASC_8384
** Mail         ASC_8384@foxmail.com
*/


.unread,
.highlight,
.Messages-newItem,
.PushNotifications-newItem,
.PushNotifications-followItem:hover,
.Select-option:hover,
.SearchBar-menu,
.SearchBar-label,
.Editable-toolbar,
.Navbar,
.TopstorySideBar-navNumber,
.TopstorySideBar-navLink:hover,
.Menu-dropdown,
.Messages-item:hover,
.PushNotifications-newItem,

.VoteButton,
.LikeButton/* 新版点赞按钮 */
{
	background: #222!important;
	border: 1px solid #3B6092 !important
}
.Button.is-active {
	background: #3B6092 !important
}
.AppHeader-navItem.is-active {
	color: #CCC!important
}
.HomeEntry-box,
.editable {
	border: 1px solid #fff;
}
img[eeimg="1"],
.ColumnEnd-icon {
	filter: invert(100%);
}

/* 公式图反色 */
/* 深蓝底标签 */
.QuestionTopic,
.TopicTag,
.Comments-Packup-Button,
.CommentEditor-singleButton {
	color: #fff!important;
	background: #3B6092!important;
}
.entry-title,
strong,
.HomeEntry-box,
.block-title span,
.editable,
.pagination,
.tabs-anchor,
.ng-scope,
.ng-valid,
.info-content,

/* 针对新版主页 */
.zu-top,
.current .zu-top-nav-link,
.AppHeader,
.Tabs-link,

.Pagination,
.PaginationButton,
.Input-wrapper,
.PushNotifications-content,
.Messages-content,
.Popover-fixedTargetContainer .Menu-item,
.Notifications-footer,
.Messages-footer,
.Modal-inner,
.PageHeader-content,
.ProfileHeader-wrapper,
.HoverCard,
.Menu,
.menu-item,
.NumberBoard-value,
.PushNotifications-item span,
.CommentItem,
.CommentTopbar,
.CommentTopbar-title,
.Select-button,
.Select-list,
.Comments-footer,
.DraftEditor-root,
._CommentForm_root_1-ko,
._InputBox_empty_3_ur,
.AnswerForm-footer,
.QuestionHeader,
.QuestionHeader-footer,
.QuestionHeader-title,
.Modal-title,
.Navbar,
.BlockTitle-title,
.PostIndex-recommendZone::before,
.ProfileHeader-detail,
.Profile-warnText,
.Layout,
.TopstoryHeader-navItem,
.Comments-pattern-loading,
.Topbar,
.AppHeaderProfileMenu-item,
.Field-label,
.Card-card-102t,
.TabNavBar-root-3526,
.LiveItem-title-vgQH,
.RelatedLives-subject,

/* Live */
.title,

/* 文章编辑器 */
.zg-editor-input,

/* 私信 */
.menu-nav a,
.item,
.module-header,
.item-actions,
.items-fulid,
.global-footer,

/* 圆桌 */
.SearchTabs,
.TopSearch-items a,

/* 新版搜索 */
.Post-content,
.Recommendations-Main,
.Sticky,
.Comments,
.BlockTitle,

/* 新版专栏 */
.Input,

/* 后面这些代码不记得是用的谁的了 _(:з」∠)_ */
.zm-editable-toolbar-container,
#zu-distraction-free-editor,
.goog-toolbar,
.modal-dialog-buttons,
body,
.zu-top-search-input,
.zu-top-search-input:focus,
.zu-autocomplete-row-label,
.zm-item-tag,
.zm-comment-list,
.zm-meta-panel,
#header,
.modal-dialog,
.zu-top-search .ac-renderer,
.zm-comment-form,
.up,
.down,
.zm-item-vote-count,
li.tab-nav.active .anchor,
.profile-navbar,
.popover-content,
.upper,
.lower,
.tagline,
.secondary *,
._CommentItem_content_CYqW,
.comment-list,
.ac-renderer *,
.zm-comment-content,
.zm-profile-search-query-input,
.zu-top-nav-userinfo.selected,
#top-nav-profile-dropdown [href],
.zu-top-nav-userinfo,
.zm-comment-editable,
.zm-editable-editor-field-element,
.zm-editable-editor-field-wrap,
.more-awesome span,
.follow-button.zg-follow.zg-btn-green,
.zg-btn.zg-btn-follow.zm-rich-follow-btn.small.nth-0,
#zh-question-operation-menu,
.goog-menu.goog-menu-vertical,
li.tab-nav:nth-child(1) > a:nth-child(1),
a.active,
.zm-side-nav-link:hover {
	background: none #222!important;
	color: #ddd!important;
}
.badge-summary *,
.AuthorInfo-badge,
blockquote {
	color: #aaa!important;
}
.modal-dialog-bg {
	background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .8)!important;
}
.zu-top-nav-live > * {
	background: #222!important;
}
.name,
.zm-item-answer-author-wrap a {
	color: #ff8000!important;
}
.zm-favo-list-item-title,
.ng-binding {
	color: #bbb!important;
}
.zg-btn-white.zu-button-more,
.zu-autocomplete-row-search-link,
.load-more:HOVER,
.lbl,
.zg-form-text-input.add-question-title-form,
#zh-question-suggest-title-content,
.zu-question-suggest-topic-input.label-input-label,
.ac-row {
	background: none#222!important;
	color: #bbb!important;
	border-left-color: #000!important;
	border-right-color: #222!important;
	border-bottom-color: #000!important;
	border-top-color: #000!important;
	margin-top: 0px!important;
}
.up.pressed,
.down.pressed {
	background: none#444!important;
	color: #bbb!important;
}
.zu-top-add-question,
.content-wrap,
.question-title,
.content,
.modal-dialog.absolute-position,
.modal-dialog-title.modal-dialog-title-draggable {
	background: none#222!important;
	color: #bbb!important;
}
.ac-row.ac-active.active {
	background-color: #222!important
}
.zu-autocomplete-row-name,
.zm-ac-link {
	color: white!important
}
.global-header,
.qr {
	visibility: hidden!important;
}
